title: 放假延后

大家的假期都延后了吗？

replies.author: _Star_Light_
replies.txt_content: 新年快乐！！！

replies.author: FloatingBlocks
replies.txt_content:
不知道啊
我们还没说

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
不知道，还没通知
希望延几天

replies.author: cangkuai
replies.txt_content: 太好了

replies.author: 爱你灬淡以
replies.txt_content: 我在天津，还没通知，希望延期几天

replies.author: Laomyu666
replies.txt_content:
yantai这边只是说计划延迟www
伤心。。

replies.author: Ermer
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 鲸鱼不是鱼
replies.txt_content: 收到！

replies.author: 青芦叶
replies.txt_content: 羡慕啊，我也希望能多休息几天，可惜一直都没有消息

replies.author: 游侠大大
replies.txt_content: 没收到通知

replies.author: 360g
replies.txt_content: 我不知道他们吃蝙蝠是为什么，我在家里快憋死了

replies.author: 5656w
replies.txt_content: 是的

replies.author: jelly2
replies.txt_content: 放假也不见得好，呆在家里是真的闲

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 我就是2月17开始上课，所以这个通知没有影响

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 与其说“放假延后”倒不如说“假期延长”，原标题给人一种“假期开始时间变晚了”的感觉

replies.author: 痴情乄
replies.txt_content: 我们这**还没说

replies.author: haijin
replies.txt_content: 延后了10天

replies.author: xiaodan_979791
replies.txt_content: 可惜我不在那里...还没通知

replies.author: 翼之
replies.txt_content: 爽，我们这边多放了七天

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content: 我们这边还要看情况的说
